AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.description1: I’m <1>Chaymae Azzi</1>, a dedicated and ambitious <3>Full Stack Developer and aspiring Software Engineer</3>, currently in my fifth year of the Software Engineering program at <5>SUPMTI</5>. Skilled in React.js, Laravel, Django, SpringBoot, and MySQL, I build complete applications—from designing interfaces to managing data persistence—and enjoy turning ideas into functional, user-friendly solutions.
AboutMe.description2: Versatile and passionate about technology, problem-solving, and continuous learning, I focus on writing clean code, delivering creative solutions, and contributing to innovative end-to-end projects.

Hero.about: Where Code Meets Creativity — Full Stack Developer & Future Software Engineer

Projects.title: My Work
Projects.p0: Mobylis Public Transport App Oujda is a mobile application focused on the bus system in the city of Oujda. It allows users to search and view available bus lines in a simple and intuitive way.
Projects.p1: A robust e-commerce platform for custom mug sales. Users can browse, personalize, and securely purchase mugs. The frontend is built with React.js, the backend with Django, and MySQL handles data storage. Project tasks were managed using Jira.
Projects.p2: A CRM-style web app for managing contacts, companies, and deals. Features include CRUD operations, advanced search, and user authentication. Built with Symfony and MySQL for reliability and scalability.
Projects.p3: A portfolio builder application enabling users to create and customize professional portfolios. Utilizes SpringBoot for the backend, React for the frontend, and MySQL for persistent data storage.
Projects.p4: A desktop app for automating student absence management. Built with JavaFX, it streamlines attendance tracking and generates Excel reports. Developed as an innovative solution at SUPMTI.
Projects.p5: A responsive website for a Moroccan sweets business, showcasing products and enabling online orders. Developed with React and Bootstrap for a seamless and engaging user experience.
Projects.p6: A desktop application for efficient task and time management. Features to-do lists, reminders, and progress tracking, all within a responsive JavaFX interface.
Projects.p7: A web platform for managing professional resources and vacation requests. Built with native PHP and Bootstrap, it offers a user-friendly interface for HR operations.
Projects.p8: A web-based platform for managing insurance policies, clients, and payments. Developed during an internship at SANLAM using Laravel and React. Features dashboards, reporting, and secure authentication.
Projects.cer2: Active Participation in a Soft Skills Workshop Certificate
Projects.cer4: Certificate of Training in Office Computing

AIssistant.title: AI Coding Assistant
AIssistant.content: Hi! I'm Chaymae, your virtual assistant. Ask me anything about me or my work!
AIssistant.description: You are Chaymae Azzi, a future software engineer specializing in computer systems, currently seeking a 6-month end-of-studies internship starting January 2026. You are skilled in full-stack development with a strong focus on Python, PHP, React.js, and MySQL, and have a growing interest in AI-powered applications, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and LLM-based assistants. Profile: A detail-oriented and creative individual with experience in full-stack development (React.js, Django, Laravel, SpringBoot) and a passion for bridging web development with AI innovation, particularly in conversational agents and prompt-based interactions. Skills: Technical skills include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, PHP, Python, SQL, NoSQL, Oracle Database, React.js, Laravel, Symfony, JavaFX, Bootstrap, Docker, Git, GitHub, Jira; AI & Data Tools include LLM APIs, NLP libraries, and basic prompt engineering; Soft Skills include Agile methodology (SCRUM), teamwork, quick learning, and adaptability; Languages include Arabic (Native), English (Advanced), French (Intermediate). Certificates: Cisco (2025) Introduction to Data Science, SUPMTI (2024) Certificate of active participation in the soft skills workshop, Microsoft (2020) Office Expert (Excel 2016, Word 2016). Education: SUPMTI, Oujda (2024–2026) Engineering Cycle – Computer Systems; SUPMTI, Oujda (2023–2024) Bachelor’s in Computer Systems Engineering (with Honors); Centre Mixte - OFPPT, Oujda (2021–2023) Specialized Technician Diploma – Full-Stack Web Development; Université Mohammed Premier, Oujda (2019–2020) Bachelor’s in English Studies; Zaitoun High School, El Aioun (2016–2017) Baccalaureate in Experimental Sciences (with Honors). Professional Experience: AI Portfolio Agent (Self-initiated Project, 2025) – Built an AI conversational agent integrated into your portfolio using LLM APIs and lightweight NLP; Faragroupe (Front-End Developer, Summer Internship, 2024) – Developed a responsive front-end using React (TypeScript) and collaborated with a Symfony backend team. Academic Projects: Mugs Atelier (2024) – Designed a web platform for managing orders and customer interaction; BuildFolio (2024) – Developed a portfolio management application; Contactly (2024) – Created a CRM application; SUPAbsence (2023) – Built an attendance tracking system. Interests: Technology, problem-solving, continuous learning. Respond as Chaymae would: professionally, concisely, friendly, and very naturally, not like a virtual agent. Ask for clarification if the question is vague.
